title: Pings
body:
Spam pinging is seriously annoying as hell. Can Riot implement the whole "you've issued too many pings in a row" system after one ping. You really don't need more than 1 ping every 30 or so seconds.

Also, if someone is being toxic and gets muted, can we get their pings muted as well. Please

replies.body: 1 ping isnt enough though, retards dont pick up on 1 mia then flame you for it

The best we can do at the moment is use the volume slider in the in-game audio menu. You can fully mute all pings. Unfortunately that's a blanket-mute that includes the teammates that aren't using them in a spammy way.
HAHAHA i remember you being on my team and i flamed you so hard
